channel.title: Posts on My Website!
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My Website!

item.title: Python!
item.description: I really enjoyed using R Studio, and the thought of having to learn a whole new system stressed me out. Fortunately, the Reticulate package allows users to use R and Python together. #R code library(reticulate) mydog <- "say hello to" #Python code mydog="Canela" print(r.mydog,mydog) ## say hello to Canela #R code cat(c(mydog,py$mydog)) ## say hello to Canela Below is a photo of my dog, Canela!
